SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BarrelPinger
The BarrelPinger class is responsible for periodically pinging the RMIGateway to indicate that the IndexStorageBarrel is still active and available.
BarrelPopulate
This class represents the BarrelPopulate class, which is responsible for populating the database with data from SyncData and CrawlData objects.
BarrelProcessing
The BarrelProcessing class provides methods for calculating TF, IDF, and TF-IDF values of terms in documents.
BarrelReceiver
The BarrelReceiver class is responsible for receiving data from a ReliableMulticast object and inserting it into an IndexStorageBarrel object.
BarrelRetriever
The BarrelRetriever class is responsible for retrieving data from the database related to website crawling and indexing.
BarrelSetup
The BarrelSetup class provides methods for setting up and maintaining the integrity of the database tables.
BarrelSync
The BarrelSync class implements the Runnable interface and is responsible for synchronizing data between IndexStorageBarrel and ReliableMulticast.
BarrelTimestamp
Represents a BarrelTimestamp object that holds information about a remote barrel and its timestamp.
BloomFilter
The BloomFilter class represents a probabilistic data structure used to test whether an element is a member of a set.
BloomFilter.SimpleHash
The SimpleHash class represents a hash function used by the Bloom filter.
BloomFilterTester
This class is used to test the functionality of the BloomFilter class.
Container
The Container class represents a container for data to be sent over a network.
ContainersTimestamp
Represents a container timestamp, which contains an array of containers and a timestamp value.
CrawlData
Represents the data obtained from crawling a web page.
Downloader
The Downloader class represents a downloader application that creates multiple downloader workers to download files from a queue server using multicast communication.
DownloaderWorker
The DownloaderWorker class represents a worker that visits URLs and performs crawling tasks.
IndexStorageBarrel
The IndexStorageBarrel class represents a storage barrel for indexing and storing crawl data.
IndexStorageBarrelInterface
The IndexStorageBarrelInterface represents the remote interface for the Index Storage Barrel component.
IntegrityChecker
The IntegrityChecker class is responsible for checking the integrity of received data and requesting retransmission if necessary.
LogUtil
The LogUtil class provides utility methods for logging error and informational messages.
LogUtil.logging
The logging class provides a method to get a logger for a specified class.
ProtocolTester
This class represents a protocol tester for the ReliableMulticast system.
QueryResult
Represents the result of a query.
Receiver
The Receiver class represents a receiver in a reliable multicast system.
ReceiverListener
The ReceiverListener class is responsible for receiving data from a DatagramChannel and providing it to a worker thread.
ReceiverWorker
The ReceiverWorker class is responsible for processing received containers in a separate thread.
ReliableMulticast
The ReliableMulticast class provides a reliable multicast communication mechanism.
RetransmitRequest
Represents a retransmit request for a missing container in a reliable multicast protocol.
RMIClient
The RMIClient class represents a client for the RMI (Remote Method Invocation) system.
RMIGateway
The RMIGateway class represents the RMI gateway for the search engine system.
RMIGatewayInterface
The RMIGatewayInterface interface defines the methods that can be invoked remotely by clients.
SearchData
Represents the search data for a specific document.
Sender
The Sender class is responsible for sending data over a multicast network.
Sender.CircularHashMap<K,V>
A custom implementation of a circular hash map that extends the LinkedHashMap class.
StorageTester
The StorageTester class is used to send dummy data to the barrel.
SyncData
The SyncData class represents the data to synchronize between IndexStorageBarrel and ReliableMulticast.
SyncRequest
The SyncRequest class represents a request to synchronize data between
URLQueue
Represents a URL queue that stores URLs and provides methods to enqueue and dequeue URLs.
URLQueueInterface
The URLQueueInterface defines the methods for interacting with a URL queue in a distributed system.
